original_text: Their visions about the battle have deceived them. What they think will happen is only lies. The sword will punish wicked people with death. The time for their final punishment has now arrived. Their visions about the battle have deceived them. What they think will happen is only lies. The sword will punish wicked people with death. The time for their final punishment has now arrived. Their visions about the battle have deceived them.
korean_text: 네게 대하여 허무한 것을 보며 네게 대하여 거짓 복술을 하는 자가 너를 중상 당한 악인의 목 위에 두리니 이는 그의 날 곧 죄악의 마지막 때가 이름이로다

sentences.original_text: Their visions about the battle have deceived them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 전투에 대한 환상이 그들을 속였습니다.

sentences.original_text: What they think will happen is only lies.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 일어날 것이라고 생각하는 것은 거짓말뿐입니다.

sentences.original_text: The sword will punish wicked people with death.
sentences.korean_translation: 칼은 악한 사람들을 죽음으로 벌할 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: The time for their final punishment has now arrived.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 최종 벌을 받을 때가 이제 도래했습니다.

sentences.original_text: Their visions about the battle have deceived them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 전투에 대한 환상이 그들을 속였습니다.

sentences.original_text: What they think will happen is only lies.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 일어날 것이라고 생각하는 것은 거짓말뿐입니다.

sentences.original_text: The sword will punish wicked people with death.
sentences.korean_translation: 칼은 악한 사람들을 죽음으로 벌할 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: The time for their final punishment has now arrived.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 최종 벌을 받을 때가 이제 도래했습니다.

sentences.original_text: Their visions about the battle have deceived them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 전투에 대한 환상이 그들을 속였습니다.
